content: Phase 1: Get integration playbooks (Sanity.io, Resend, reCAPTCHA v3)
Phase 1: Create Next.js 15 project skeleton with App Router
Phase 1: Implement Sanity.io client and schemas
Phase 1: Create /api/contact with honeypot, rate limiting, reCAPTCHA placeholder
Phase 2: Full project setup with all dependencies
Phase 2: Build Homepage (Hero, Services preview, Social proof, Process, Tech stack, FAQ, CTA)
Phase 2: Build Services page (11 services with filtering)
Phase 2: Build Contact page with protected form
Phase 2: Build Pricing page (4 tiers comparison)
Phase 2: Implement Framer Motion animations throughout
Phase 2: SEO/GEO setup (metadata, sitemap, robots.txt, LLMs.txt, structured data)
